title: Ticket #5396: Document correspondence between DAGMan args and config
description: Pretty much all condor_submit_dag (and condor_dagman) command-line arguments have corresponding configuration macros. We should have at least notes (and maybe links) in both directions between these. I'm going to do this now for the maxidle stuff as part of #5332, but I don't have time to do it for all of them.
creator: wenger
